objects.text:
• Japanese Patented Technology
• AIHA Certified
• Medium Firm Orthopedic
• 10 Years Warranty

product_details.name: The Sleep Company SmartGRID Ortho Mattress | Japanese Patented Technology | AIHA Certified | Medium Firm Orthopedic Mattress for Back Pain Relief | 10 Years Warranty | Queen Size Bed 72x66x8 | Grey
product_details.description: Color: Grey. Is Assembly Required: No. Assembly Type: Already Assembled. Primary material: SmartGRID. Top Material: cotton. Upholstery material: Cotton. Warranty Summary: 10 years Warranty. Style: 8 Inch. Capacity: 72x66. Number of Pieces: 1. What is in the box?: SmartGRID Ortho Grey Mattress, SmartGRID Squishy Smaple, Mattress Warranty Card. Item Shape: Rectangular. Mattress Comfort: Medium. Top Finish: Tight Top. Care Instructions: Ensure maximum comfort by placing mattress on flat surface; easily clean spills with damp cloth.. Number of Shelves: 1. Item Model Number: TSCMO8060. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 41 kg. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 182.8 x 167.6 x 20 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1.00 count. Generic Name: Orthopaedic mattress.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and clean design with a visually engaging diagonal split background using deep and bright blue gradients. The top-left features a bold and prominent title (id: "heading") in white followed by a contrasting subheading (id: "subheading") in light blue to highlight the product type. Below this, a list of key features (id: "description") is neatly laid out with bullet points. A supportive tagline (id: "tagline") reinforces the product benefit. The product image (id: "product_image") on the right is anchored prominently for focus. The price (id: "price") is large and attention-grabbing, placed above a call-to-action button (id: "cta") with a contrasting rectangular background (id: "cta_background") to encourage engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0A2D52
- Bright Blue: #1B8ACD
- Sky Blue: #3AA9E0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image prominently features a soothing and modern blue color palette, ideal for conveying comfort and tranquility in an advertisement. The luxurious bed uses various shades of blue—sky blue (#6EC1E4), deep cyan (#137DB8), and azure (#00AEEF)—to create depth and richness. These tones are blended harmoniously across the headboard, pillows, base, and mattress layers, ensuring a clean and cohesive look. The crisp white mattress top (#F6F6F6) adds contrast and brightness, enhancing the blue elements. Navy blue (#162B50) is used in the brand logo for clarity and emphasis. This palette communicates calmness, quality sleep, and modern sophistication.
